About me

My name is Jon Harlem. I'm learning to program at Galvanize's Full Stack program (aka gSchool). I have experience in product design and development, web development, UX, and healthcare. I have worked as a product manager for a startup, a staff research associate at USCF, and a freelancer. Now I'm working to learn how to code and writing about it!
